headline: Discover Financial, United Airlines, Canada Goose: Market Minute
summary: Stocks (^GSPC, ^IXIC, ^DJI) are mixed ahead of a busy week filled with labor market data and tariff news. Discover Financial shares are rising after the company will keep its interim CEO through June.   The FAA has approved United Airlines (UAL) Starlink-equipped aircraft.  Canada Goose (GOOS) shares were downgraded by Barclays. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

summary: United Airlines's commercial passengers will experience Elon Musk's Starlink technology starting in May, according to a statement from the airline.

headline: United To Launch First Flight With Free Starlink Wi-Fi in May
summary: United Airlines received the green light from regulators to launch its first commercial flight with free Starlink Wi-Fi service from a division of Elon Musk's SpaceX in May.

headline: United receives FAA approval for first Starlink-equipped airplanes
summary: United said the FAA issued a Supplemental Type Certificate for the Embraer 175 and the airline expects the first commercial flight to be onboard a United Express Embraer 175.  United will work with Starlink to secure FAA approval to install Starlink on more than 16 United aircraft models.

raw.headline: United receives FAA approval for first Starlink-equipped airplanes
raw.summary: United said the FAA issued a Supplemental Type Certificate for the Embraer 175 and the airline expects the first commercial flight to be onboard a United Express Embraer 175.  United will work with Starlink to secure FAA approval to install Starlink on more than 16 United aircraft models.

headline: United Receives FAA Certification on Starlink Aircraft and Schedules First Commercial Flight for May 2025
summary: United today announced the FAA has approved its first Starlink-equipped aircraft type and that the first commercial flight is planned for May, less than eight months after the deal was first announced.

raw.headline: United Receives FAA Certification on Starlink Aircraft and Schedules First Commercial Flight for May 2025
raw.summary: United today announced the FAA has approved its first Starlink-equipped aircraft type and that the first commercial flight is planned for May, less than eight months after the deal was first announced.

headline: Travel and Vacation Providers Stocks Q4 Results: Benchmarking United Airlines (NASDAQ:UAL)
summary: As the craze of earnings season draws to a close, here’s a look back at some of the most exciting (and some less so) results from Q4. Today, we are looking at travel and vacation providers stocks, starting with United Airlines (NASDAQ:UAL).
